data.what_is:
Dotdigital is an all-in-one customer experience and data platform (CXDP) that empowers marketing teams to exceed customer expectations with highly personalized cross-channel journeys.

With Dotdigital, marketers can seamlessly unify, enrich, and segment customer data. Breaking down data siloes, Dotdigital streamlines decision-making and paves the way for marketing creativity that delivers customer engagement at scale. With powerful AI capabilities, Dotdigital makes it easy to automate deeply personalized experiences across web, email, SMS, WhatsApp, chat, push, social, ads, and more.

Trusted by over 4,000 brands across ecommerce, retail, not-for-profit, education, financial services, and other sectors, Dotdigital enables marketers across the globe. Headquartered in London and established in 1999, Dotdigital is focused on building trusted, connected, and future-proofed solutions that empower customer-obsessed businesses. Learn more at dotdigital.com.
data.product_description: Customer data platform and cross-channel marketing automation for SMEs, retailers, and big brands.
data.supported_languages: German, English, Finnish, French, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Malay, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish, Chinese (Simplified)

pricing_plans.plan_description: For marketing teams with a need for basic multi-channel marketing automation.
For advanced marketing teams looking to unify data and deliver dynamic customer experiences. Includes everything in Email & SMS plus:
For enterprise businesses with a dynamic and ambitious marketing function. Includes everything in CXDP plus:

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 194 Dotdigital reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 182 Dotdigital reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: Based on 147 Dotdigital reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 190 Dotdigital reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 154 Dotdigital reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

initial_reviews.review_title: Non-profit success story
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
As a charity dedicated to tackling pressing social issues, selecting the right tools and partnerships is crucial for us at the Joseph Rowntree Foundation. Our collaboration with Dotdigital has been transformative, largely due to the exceptional support from our Senior Customer Success Manager, Bryony.

Bryony has consistently exhibited the utmost professionalism, friendliness, and politeness in every interaction. Her flexibility in managing her calendar to accommodate our needs has been invaluable, enabling us to schedule regular meetings that specifically address our organisational requirements. These regular discussions have significantly enhanced our understanding and usage of the platform, particularly in the areas of segmentation and automation. This has streamlined our data management processes, enabling more effective communication and a stronger focus on our core mission of combating poverty in the UK.

What sets Bryony apart is her profound knowledge of the Dotdigital platform. Whenever we have faced more specialised queries, Bryony has swiftly connected us with the appropriate experts within the organisation, ensuring that our needs always feel like a priority, irrespective of our non-profit status or size. This personalised support ensures that we never feel overshadowed by larger, corporate clients.

The impact of Dotdigital on our operations has been profound, enabling more nuanced and efficient engagement strategies that are critical in our fight against poverty. For any charity seeking a reliable and supportive email marketing solution, I can confidently recommend Dotdigital. Thanks to Bryony and her team, we feel valued and empowered to pursue our goals.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
While Dotdigital offers a comprehensive suite of tools, it's important to note that as a non-profit focused on social issues rather than e-commerce, we at the Joseph Rowntree Foundation find that some of the more e-commerce-centric features aren't applicable to our operations. This includes advanced tools like engagement personas, which are designed for commercial metrics and customer tracking--functions that don't directly translate to our needs. Nonetheless, the platform still provides significant value through its other capabilities that we are able to leverage effectively.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Using their automation programs, we've streamlined how we manage data and communicate with stakeholders. This means we can send out publications and event invites that are really tailored to individual interests. It's made our communications not just more relevant, but more personal too, strengthening our relationships and keeping everyone engaged with the work we're passionate about.

initial_reviews.review_title: 10/10 to DotDigital platform & its team!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I appreciate the platform's user-friendliness and intuitive design. Tasks like creating segments, building emails, designing automations, integration are straightforward. Dotdigital assisted in implementing a complex customer retention automations to align with our business goals. It is a powerful platform and would highly recommend it. Not the least, the support and account managers at DD team are brilliant and take pride in their work.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
All good experience - I recommendation as a platform user would be to improve "Reporting style" more filters, KPIs, UX in reporting section.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?

initial_reviews.review_title: Good old fashioned service and support
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
The team are brilliant, from the onboarding wizards who made integration and implementation a breeze, and account managers to the support team everyone is so helpful. Too often I sign up for these tools and promises are made about their effectiveness however without expert guidence results are hard to achieve. The DotDigital team have supported my team from the beginning and have been willing to move at what ever pace me and my internal team were capable of.
I love the reporting features and dashboards when I was speaking to the sales team they explained that they are different in that DotDigital is a complete customer data platform not just an email marketing tool.
The whole platform is so easy to use, I log in daily and always learn something new.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
We struggled early with the plan we were set up on, the sending caps did not accurately reflect our behaviour so we used up our allowance very quickly. With some support from our account manager we are back on track and are on a plan that better suits our needs.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
DotDigital gave me more clarity around my customer. With the added insights that I gain I am able to reach the right customer to see my message at the most relevant time.

initial_reviews.review_title: Very good support and almost instant responses
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I find this platform very easy to use and whenever I get 'stuck' with something, the support is absolutely fault-free. You can talk to someone almost immediately and the advisors' responses are very well-explained. I've checked in about a few 'glitches' I've come across, and they've helped me to rectify these straightaway. On one occasion, when they were struggling to come up with an immediate answer, they emailed back within the hour. Great team, great software!

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
The only thing I'm not so keen on is the 'copy and paste' facility. If you use this it changes the font style/choice and you have to reset it. I prefer to just copy and paste in plain text, which works ok, and the preview looks fine, but when the newsletter actually goes out the  'leading' between the heading rows is often gappy.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending weekly newsletters out with links to articles on the website I manage (British Potato Review)

initial_reviews.review_title: Makes email marketing a dream. Easy to use and faultless customer service.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
It enables us to deliver a personalised email conversion and keep warm campaigns efficiently and with ease. It just takes a short training sessions to get new users up and running and with the various user permissions available, you can ensure that nothing gets sent before it is fully checked. Experienced users can enhance their campaigns easily by using the advanced features, sich as A/B testing or dynamic content. It is so easy to get it up and running and email campaigns implementated with no hassle. If we run into problems - the customer service is excellent and they will work through any problem with you, no matter how big or small.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
The only issue we currently have is the integration with MS Dynamics and the limit on fields that synchronise over for address lists. But that is something we have worked around.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
It allows us to quickly respond to any challenges or opportunities that are presented, with a quick turnaround on new campaigns. The reporting and analytics allow us to constantly improve and develop our email offering.

initial_reviews.review_title: Happy customers!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
We have been using Dotdigital each week/month  for around ten years now. Since implemeting it we have been able to transform our 'keep warm' and communication emails, as well as some landing pages and surveys. It is much easier to use than the previous system we used, even for the least tech savvy users here at the college. This has also saved us time, especially when we hit busy periods with sending emails to our range of different audeinces at the same time. The extensive reporting elements have proved very useful to help us measure effectiveness of our mailings. We have been able to save lots of time and train more users. Whenever we have needed help we have always found the online chat option to be great. Staff are friendly and helpful.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
There is little to dislike. It would be helpful if we could add new fonts ourselves - although this isn't something we have asked for and it may already be possible!

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Helps us to remain data compliant and not contact anyone who has unsubscribed.

initial_reviews.review_title: Highly Recommended 10/10
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
For the past three years, we've been using the platform, which has proven to be extremely user-friendly and easy to implement. It also offers a range of features that were not available in our previous system, enhancing our operations.

Our CSD, Chloe, has a keen eye for detail and an ability to understand our needs and suggest solutions, which makes her part of our team, bridging the gap between supplier & client and making a solid partnership between our organisations.

We've just signed a five-year contract, so we would 100% recommend DotDigital to any organisation that takes email marketing seriously.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
It's difficult to identify anything I/we dislike about the platform because the customer service team and the delivery team are always happy to listen to our requirements and integrations and offer solutions.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
The platform enables us to automate work through automated journeys and campaign planners. This frees up our team to plan and strategise rather than get bogged down in the daily processes of setting up mailings and mailing lists.

initial_reviews.review_title: I would highly recommend Dotdigital to create professional, automated marketing campaigns.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
Dotdigital is simple to use to create complex automation journey's. Support and regular meetings with our dedicated Account Director, Paul Langhan is invaluable, who regularly communicates new release features and solutions to automate processes.
Dotdigital are constantly evolving, allowing us to integrate additional channels and enabling us to keep up with advancements in personalisation and AI technology.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
Due to our internal company structure, we have 5 separate Dotdigital accounts and we are currently only able to use web behaviour tracking within the parent account.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dotdigital is primarily used for lead nurture campaigns via automation journeys. The analytics and program reports are beneficial to measure the success of the campaigns and provide marketing qualified leads through to the sales teams.
Transactional emails are also an essential use of Dotdigital, providing customers with important contract, product and release updates.

initial_reviews.review_title: DotDigital: A Great Email Marketing Platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I have been using DotDigital for a few months and I find it useful for the following reasons:
*	It has a user-friendly interface that makes it easy to design and send emails.
*	It has a powerful segmentation and personalization engine that allows me to target my audience based on their behavior and preferences.
*	It has a comprehensive reporting and analytics dashboard that shows me how my campaigns are performing and what I can improve.
*	It has a variety of add-ons such as the survey creation which I find it very useful and straight forward

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
*	It is quite expensive compared to some of its competitors, especially if you have a large email list or need advanced features.
*	It has a limited number of templates and layouts to choose from, which can make it hard to create unique and engaging emails.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
- How to communicate with our customers across multiple channels, such as email, and landing pages (surveys).
- How to segment and target our audience based on their behavior, preferences, and interests.
- How to automate and personalize our marketing campaigns to increase engagement and conversion rates.
- How to measure and optimize our marketing performance using analytics and reporting tools.
- How to integrate our marketing platform with other tools and platforms (CRM)

initial_reviews.review_title: The platform is so user-friendly, great support team and account managers are 10/10
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I love how user-friendly the platform is, and how intuitive it is. Things like creating segments, building emails, designing automations and reporting are all so easy to do. Some of the more advanced features such as contact persona scoring are very useful when building out targeted segments and take away some of the manual work required for customer data. I have excellent support from my account managers who are constantly there working with me on my projects and helping me get things off the ground. Dotdigital have also helped me build out a super complex replenishment automation which is something the business has been keen to implement. I have never felt restrcited by the platform, it allows us to exuctue everything from a CRM point of view.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
There are small things such as some of the limitations when building out segments or when scheduling emails that I have seen on other platforms but not on Dotdigital.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Building out advanced customer journeys - unfortuantly we don't have a huge dev team but with the help of Dotdigital they have helped us develop, build out and execute mulitple journeys. In the pipeline at the moment is Abandon Basket, I have simply subbmitted a brief and Dotdigtal will develop the whole automation for us.

initial_reviews.review_title: Dotdigital - a great comms platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I feel that Dotdigital is an amazing platform. There is so much you can do within the platform from email blasts through to nurturing prospects across various integrated channels.

Various individuals across our Marketing department use the platform and even though email isnt their core role, with the simplicity and ease of use they are able to build out different automated journeys for event management through to prospect nurturing.

Plus their online customer service tool is one of if not the best tool I have used.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
There arent really any downsides to the platform apart from there is so much that the platform can do for you, that you are left feeling that you might not be driving the best value from it.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
We dont have any problems as such. What Dotdigital does solve for us is empowering the team to be able to send emails out even though that isnt their core function of their role.

initial_reviews.review_content:

Very intuitive and easy-to-use. There's a good onboarding, so you have a very short learningcurve before sending your first email or setting up your first program. The Dotdigital team is very easy to reach in case of problems, or to help with challenges or defining the next step for your marketing strategy. The blog and training hub offer a lot of information to work independently.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
Looking forward to have more marketing automation options such as A/B testing text, images, ... on landingpages or pop-ups available in the platform itself (no additional integration necessary).

Segmentation and personalisation options to send more personalised emails
Check on contact level who opened certain emails
Send emails based on website behavior and predicted behaviour based on RFM dashboards
Ameliorate the design of the emails which increases click rate

Automated programs on every important point in the customer journey (subscription, abandoned cart, post-purchase, ...)

initial_reviews.review_title: A product that does it all with an easy to use interface
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
The ease of use adn flexability are the key elemetns that make DotDigital my prefereed Email sending marketing tool.

The easy way you can crete adn bring in elemetns such as images and then implement buttons to access third party content is fantastic.

We frequently use this tool ot communicate with our customer base for various communications and its easy to implement changes or extra features at the touch of a button dragging adn ropping elements fromt eh builder.

their customer support is always foirst class and respond quickly should you need advice or help.

I've used Dotdigital for over 10 years now and  its ever increasing adaptabilty is the key to my staying with the product.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
The downsides for me are just sometimes the flexability of text ie leading etc isn't always great, I'd love to be able to add some animated Gif or MP4 content that would work within an email one day. On the whole it does the job though.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have a customer base that requires direct communication about new products and technical information plus a loyalty club whose members benefit form specific communication to them. We also have Export customers abroad so the fact we cna reach all these parties simply to ciommunicate information means we have a multi channel offering of marketing materila both online and offline.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great omni channel tool with plenty of features for small or big businesses.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
Omni channel options, easy automation and journey builder.

Email builder with drag and drop functionality easy to use by even the most novice user.

Setting up additional team members, with varying access rights is very straight forward.

Analytics is great, particuarly if you are looking to report on a campaign by campaign basis with an very useful tool to compare like-for-like campaigns

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
No ability to collaborate with the creation of a compaign with other team members so we can track changes.

Additional charges/add ons for functionality that come standing with other tools; lead scoring for example.

Pay as you go SMS rates continue to rise

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dotdigital, and the implementation of a number of child accounts has allowed our business  (a very large corporate) to centralise all of the company's email activity from marketing, B2B and internal comms.  It give us the central place for all activity that can be managed by dozens of stakeholders.

initial_reviews.review_title: Easy way to send bulk emails, but keep them personalised and warm
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I like the way you can make interesting emails, that are tailored to the organisation, The templates make the emails look professional, but at the same time seem warm and friendly- ideal for the hospice. Its easy to add a little extra paragraph to each bulk email referencing the circumstance of our donor.

It is really easy to use, even if you are not very IT literate,  and is easy to get used to. There are lots of individual features that you can tweak and edit, to get just the right email heading, or return address, and to add unsubscribe links, or links to the website

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
I'm not brilliant at editng templates, but that is more my lack of technical knowledge!

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
It really makes our email communication so much more personal and interesting to the recipients, espcially our in memeory products, which are so sensitive.

My fudnraisng collegues also use it for marketing their events, as it makes the  invites look so bright and inviting.

all_reviews.review_title: Non-profit success story
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
As a charity dedicated to tackling pressing social issues, selecting the right tools and partnerships is crucial for us at the Joseph Rowntree Foundation. Our collaboration with Dotdigital has been transformative, largely due to the exceptional support from our Senior Customer Success Manager, Bryony.

Bryony has consistently exhibited the utmost professionalism, friendliness, and politeness in every interaction. Her flexibility in managing her calendar to accommodate our needs has been invaluable, enabling us to schedule regular meetings that specifically address our organisational requirements. These regular discussions have significantly enhanced our understanding and usage of the platform, particularly in the areas of segmentation and automation. This has streamlined our data management processes, enabling more effective communication and a stronger focus on our core mission of combating poverty in the UK.

What sets Bryony apart is her profound knowledge of the Dotdigital platform. Whenever we have faced more specialised queries, Bryony has swiftly connected us with the appropriate experts within the organisation, ensuring that our needs always feel like a priority, irrespective of our non-profit status or size. This personalised support ensures that we never feel overshadowed by larger, corporate clients.

The impact of Dotdigital on our operations has been profound, enabling more nuanced and efficient engagement strategies that are critical in our fight against poverty. For any charity seeking a reliable and supportive email marketing solution, I can confidently recommend Dotdigital. Thanks to Bryony and her team, we feel valued and empowered to pursue our goals.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
While Dotdigital offers a comprehensive suite of tools, it's important to note that as a non-profit focused on social issues rather than e-commerce, we at the Joseph Rowntree Foundation find that some of the more e-commerce-centric features aren't applicable to our operations. This includes advanced tools like engagement personas, which are designed for commercial metrics and customer tracking--functions that don't directly translate to our needs. Nonetheless, the platform still provides significant value through its other capabilities that we are able to leverage effectively.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Using their automation programs, we've streamlined how we manage data and communicate with stakeholders. This means we can send out publications and event invites that are really tailored to individual interests. It's made our communications not just more relevant, but more personal too, strengthening our relationships and keeping everyone engaged with the work we're passionate about.

all_reviews.review_title: Good old fashioned service and support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
The team are brilliant, from the onboarding wizards who made integration and implementation a breeze, and account managers to the support team everyone is so helpful. Too often I sign up for these tools and promises are made about their effectiveness however without expert guidence results are hard to achieve. The DotDigital team have supported my team from the beginning and have been willing to move at what ever pace me and my internal team were capable of.
I love the reporting features and dashboards when I was speaking to the sales team they explained that they are different in that DotDigital is a complete customer data platform not just an email marketing tool.
The whole platform is so easy to use, I log in daily and always learn something new.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
We struggled early with the plan we were set up on, the sending caps did not accurately reflect our behaviour so we used up our allowance very quickly. With some support from our account manager we are back on track and are on a plan that better suits our needs.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
DotDigital gave me more clarity around my customer. With the added insights that I gain I am able to reach the right customer to see my message at the most relevant time.

all_reviews.review_title: Very good support and almost instant responses
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I find this platform very easy to use and whenever I get 'stuck' with something, the support is absolutely fault-free. You can talk to someone almost immediately and the advisors' responses are very well-explained. I've checked in about a few 'glitches' I've come across, and they've helped me to rectify these straightaway. On one occasion, when they were struggling to come up with an immediate answer, they emailed back within the hour. Great team, great software!

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
The only thing I'm not so keen on is the 'copy and paste' facility. If you use this it changes the font style/choice and you have to reset it. I prefer to just copy and paste in plain text, which works ok, and the preview looks fine, but when the newsletter actually goes out the  'leading' between the heading rows is often gappy.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending weekly newsletters out with links to articles on the website I manage (British Potato Review)

review_question_answers.answer: Sending weekly newsletters out with links to articles on the website I manage (British Potato Review)

all_reviews.review_title: Makes email marketing a dream. Easy to use and faultless customer service.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
It enables us to deliver a personalised email conversion and keep warm campaigns efficiently and with ease. It just takes a short training sessions to get new users up and running and with the various user permissions available, you can ensure that nothing gets sent before it is fully checked. Experienced users can enhance their campaigns easily by using the advanced features, sich as A/B testing or dynamic content. It is so easy to get it up and running and email campaigns implementated with no hassle. If we run into problems - the customer service is excellent and they will work through any problem with you, no matter how big or small.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
The only issue we currently have is the integration with MS Dynamics and the limit on fields that synchronise over for address lists. But that is something we have worked around.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
It allows us to quickly respond to any challenges or opportunities that are presented, with a quick turnaround on new campaigns. The reporting and analytics allow us to constantly improve and develop our email offering.

all_reviews.review_title: Happy customers!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
We have been using Dotdigital each week/month  for around ten years now. Since implemeting it we have been able to transform our 'keep warm' and communication emails, as well as some landing pages and surveys. It is much easier to use than the previous system we used, even for the least tech savvy users here at the college. This has also saved us time, especially when we hit busy periods with sending emails to our range of different audeinces at the same time. The extensive reporting elements have proved very useful to help us measure effectiveness of our mailings. We have been able to save lots of time and train more users. Whenever we have needed help we have always found the online chat option to be great. Staff are friendly and helpful.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
There is little to dislike. It would be helpful if we could add new fonts ourselves - although this isn't something we have asked for and it may already be possible!

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Helps us to remain data compliant and not contact anyone who has unsubscribed.

all_reviews.review_title: Highly Recommended 10/10
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
For the past three years, we've been using the platform, which has proven to be extremely user-friendly and easy to implement. It also offers a range of features that were not available in our previous system, enhancing our operations.

Our CSD, Chloe, has a keen eye for detail and an ability to understand our needs and suggest solutions, which makes her part of our team, bridging the gap between supplier & client and making a solid partnership between our organisations.

We've just signed a five-year contract, so we would 100% recommend DotDigital to any organisation that takes email marketing seriously.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
It's difficult to identify anything I/we dislike about the platform because the customer service team and the delivery team are always happy to listen to our requirements and integrations and offer solutions.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
The platform enables us to automate work through automated journeys and campaign planners. This frees up our team to plan and strategise rather than get bogged down in the daily processes of setting up mailings and mailing lists.

all_reviews.review_title: I would highly recommend Dotdigital to create professional, automated marketing campaigns.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
Dotdigital is simple to use to create complex automation journey's. Support and regular meetings with our dedicated Account Director, Paul Langhan is invaluable, who regularly communicates new release features and solutions to automate processes.
Dotdigital are constantly evolving, allowing us to integrate additional channels and enabling us to keep up with advancements in personalisation and AI technology.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
Due to our internal company structure, we have 5 separate Dotdigital accounts and we are currently only able to use web behaviour tracking within the parent account.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dotdigital is primarily used for lead nurture campaigns via automation journeys. The analytics and program reports are beneficial to measure the success of the campaigns and provide marketing qualified leads through to the sales teams.
Transactional emails are also an essential use of Dotdigital, providing customers with important contract, product and release updates.

all_reviews.review_title: DotDigital: A Great Email Marketing Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I have been using DotDigital for a few months and I find it useful for the following reasons:
*	It has a user-friendly interface that makes it easy to design and send emails.
*	It has a powerful segmentation and personalization engine that allows me to target my audience based on their behavior and preferences.
*	It has a comprehensive reporting and analytics dashboard that shows me how my campaigns are performing and what I can improve.
*	It has a variety of add-ons such as the survey creation which I find it very useful and straight forward

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
*	It is quite expensive compared to some of its competitors, especially if you have a large email list or need advanced features.
*	It has a limited number of templates and layouts to choose from, which can make it hard to create unique and engaging emails.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
- How to communicate with our customers across multiple channels, such as email, and landing pages (surveys).
- How to segment and target our audience based on their behavior, preferences, and interests.
- How to automate and personalize our marketing campaigns to increase engagement and conversion rates.
- How to measure and optimize our marketing performance using analytics and reporting tools.
- How to integrate our marketing platform with other tools and platforms (CRM)

all_reviews.review_title: The platform is so user-friendly, great support team and account managers are 10/10
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I love how user-friendly the platform is, and how intuitive it is. Things like creating segments, building emails, designing automations and reporting are all so easy to do. Some of the more advanced features such as contact persona scoring are very useful when building out targeted segments and take away some of the manual work required for customer data. I have excellent support from my account managers who are constantly there working with me on my projects and helping me get things off the ground. Dotdigital have also helped me build out a super complex replenishment automation which is something the business has been keen to implement. I have never felt restrcited by the platform, it allows us to exuctue everything from a CRM point of view.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
There are small things such as some of the limitations when building out segments or when scheduling emails that I have seen on other platforms but not on Dotdigital.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Building out advanced customer journeys - unfortuantly we don't have a huge dev team but with the help of Dotdigital they have helped us develop, build out and execute mulitple journeys. In the pipeline at the moment is Abandon Basket, I have simply subbmitted a brief and Dotdigtal will develop the whole automation for us.

The analytics are extremely helpful and easy to view/analyse to check on the progress of email campaigns and the effectiveness of different emails.

all_reviews.review_title: Dotdigital - a great comms platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I feel that Dotdigital is an amazing platform. There is so much you can do within the platform from email blasts through to nurturing prospects across various integrated channels.

Various individuals across our Marketing department use the platform and even though email isnt their core role, with the simplicity and ease of use they are able to build out different automated journeys for event management through to prospect nurturing.

Plus their online customer service tool is one of if not the best tool I have used.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
There arent really any downsides to the platform apart from there is so much that the platform can do for you, that you are left feeling that you might not be driving the best value from it.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
We dont have any problems as such. What Dotdigital does solve for us is empowering the team to be able to send emails out even though that isnt their core function of their role.

all_reviews.review_title: Very intuitive and easy-to-use. Good results.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
Very intuitive and easy-to-use. There's a good onboarding, so you have a very short learningcurve before sending your first email or setting up your first program. The Dotdigital team is very easy to reach in case of problems, or to help with challenges or defining the next step for your marketing strategy. The blog and training hub offer a lot of information to work independently.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
Looking forward to have more marketing automation options such as A/B testing text, images, ... on landingpages or pop-ups available in the platform itself (no additional integration necessary).

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Segmentation and personalisation options to send more personalised emails
Check on contact level who opened certain emails
Send emails based on website behavior and predicted behaviour based on RFM dashboards
Ameliorate the design of the emails which increases click rate
Automate newsletter flows to make email strategies more efficient and less time-consuming
Automated programs on every important point in the customer journey (subscription, abandoned cart, post-purchase, ...)

Dotdigital is continuously helping us to engage and keep engaged with customers. It allows us to pick up on automatic responses, etc. which prompts us to keep data up to date. We are enforcing Dotdigital to do a lot of hevay lifting for us welcome email incentive program, basket abadnoment program (which we haven't deployed yet but are sure this will reduce our basket abandonment rate) and Dotdigital enables us to provide tailored guidance to our customers dependant on the probem they need solving or the products they are interested in.

What do you like best about Dotdigital?
The ease of use adn flexability are the key elemetns that make DotDigital my prefereed Email sending marketing tool.

The easy way you can crete adn bring in elemetns such as images and then implement buttons to access third party content is fantastic.

We frequently use this tool ot communicate with our customer base for various communications and its easy to implement changes or extra features at the touch of a button dragging adn ropping elements fromt eh builder.

their customer support is always foirst class and respond quickly should you need advice or help.

I've used Dotdigital for over 10 years now and  its ever increasing adaptabilty is the key to my staying with the product.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
The downsides for me are just sometimes the flexability of text ie leading etc isn't always great, I'd love to be able to add some animated Gif or MP4 content that would work within an email one day. On the whole it does the job though.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have a customer base that requires direct communication about new products and technical information plus a loyalty club whose members benefit form specific communication to them. We also have Export customers abroad so the fact we cna reach all these parties simply to ciommunicate information means we have a multi channel offering of marketing materila both online and offline.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
Omni channel options, easy automation and journey builder.

Email builder with drag and drop functionality easy to use by even the most novice user.

Setting up additional team members, with varying access rights is very straight forward.

Analytics is great, particuarly if you are looking to report on a campaign by campaign basis with an very useful tool to compare like-for-like campaigns

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
No ability to collaborate with the creation of a compaign with other team members so we can track changes.

Additional charges/add ons for functionality that come standing with other tools; lead scoring for example.

Pay as you go SMS rates continue to rise

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dotdigital, and the implementation of a number of child accounts has allowed our business  (a very large corporate) to centralise all of the company's email activity from marketing, B2B and internal comms.  It give us the central place for all activity that can be managed by dozens of stakeholders.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy way to send bulk emails, but keep them personalised and warm
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I like the way you can make interesting emails, that are tailored to the organisation, The templates make the emails look professional, but at the same time seem warm and friendly- ideal for the hospice. Its easy to add a little extra paragraph to each bulk email referencing the circumstance of our donor.

It is really easy to use, even if you are not very IT literate,  and is easy to get used to. There are lots of individual features that you can tweak and edit, to get just the right email heading, or return address, and to add unsubscribe links, or links to the website

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
I'm not brilliant at editng templates, but that is more my lack of technical knowledge!

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
It really makes our email communication so much more personal and interesting to the recipients, espcially our in memeory products, which are so sensitive.

all_reviews.review_title: An Effortless Communication Platform - MUST HAVE for any business.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
After 8years+ of digital marketing, the onboarding and learning process with DotDigital blew me away. Everything from getting set up, ease of integration with our other platforms, platform training, right through to regular check-ins and strategy sessions with the Dot Digital team.

Our Customer success manager; Emily B - has been a godsend, not only her knowledge of effective marketing strategies that our business can implement, but her quick and adaptive problem-solving skills - so everything is always running smoothly for us.

Lastly, the amazing platform - I love the ease of use since I'm on Dot Digital every day. The analytics and reporting are seamless, showing top-line views as well as letting us get down to the nitty-gritty. My favourite functions are the email-building tools, it is so intuitive and fast, and I love how much I can customise and save templates for future use.

I am a Dot Digital convert and will be for the rest of my Email Marketing days.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
Nothing. This is now my favourite marketing software/platform hands down.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dot Digital has a full range of communication capabilities that seamlessly integrate with our website making it our main function for communicating with our customers. The easy-to-use automation functions have been life-changing and time-saving, keeping our customers engaged in a personalised way without us needing to spend as much time as we did with other platforms.

The reporting across all communication channels is also highly beneficial when analysing the customer journey with our brand - these insights have been invaluable to us and our brand's growth.

Dotdigital makes it easy to target and segment out our audience and send emails with their user-friendly drag-and-drop systems. It's a breeze to make templates and automate our emails all in place.
Their support team is one of the best and is quick to respond and solve issues. It's also great to be appointed a rep to meet with quarterly to go over issues, and upcoming changes, and be informed on what is happening at Dotdigital.

Dotdigital is serving its purpose by providing our customers with high-quality emails,  content and getting them the information they need to keep shopping with us. All while providing great reports so we know what does well and what we can improve on, it's easy to track emails and integrate with GA4 so we know exactly what we need to do.

all_reviews.review_title: User Friendly Platform - Ideal for Small Teams without In-House Development
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
The support team are very quick to respond. I've had interactions with the online chat that have been solved almost instantly,and more complex problems are picked up on and if they require more input, time is scheduled to review - so I always feel I'm being responded to and issues are being looked at.
The simple functionality of the template builder (across email and forms, to an extent automation) is I would say the second biggest benefit of the platform - making it easy for all members of the team to jump in.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
The lack of clarity regarding the requirement for triggered templates in automation over standard templates resulted in a significant investment of time and effort. Discovering this limitation late in the process was frustrating, and there is room for improvement in messaging and self-service setup, especially given the manual management of the platform.

Additionally, during my trial of the SMS function, I found the reporting to be very basic, covering only sends without including click interactions. Unfortunately, this falls short of my requirements, and as a result, I won't be further pursuing the SMS feature.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Simply the function of an email marketing platform, with the additional added benefit of landing pages and forms.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to use platform with excellent customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I've used Dotdigital for many years, and I'm continually impressed by its ease of use and its excellent value for a leading-class product. From integration to implementation, Dotdigital is a user-friendly platform to jump into and use with little experience. Over the years, Dotdigital has added numerous new features in line with market innovations and now contains an impressive suite of tools designed to meet the needs of any large marketing team or small business. Coupled with a fast, knowledgeable and attentive customer support team, Dotdigital has a great CRM and CX solution that I'd recommend to anyone looking to onboard the many services they now provide.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
Some competitors offer more integrated tools across a wider channel set if you need them and, of course, are willing to pay for them.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Providing customer experience and a relationship management touch-point for our online subscriber base while providing a consistent revenue stream and traffic source to our Magento eCommerce platform by maximising our customer lifetime value and optimising our customer buying cycle communications

all_reviews.review_title: Dotdigital - a fantastic Digital Marketing platform!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
Simply put - Dotdigital is a fantastic Digital Marketing platform. We've been using it for over ten years now since it was called Dotmailer. It that time it has developed from an email only marketing paltform into a fully-fledged digital marketing platform for email, landing oages, surveys, SMS, social media marketing, customer insights and much more. Their recent upgrade AI components and integrated email/SMS contacts has been brilliant. The campaign builder is so user-friendly and simple to use, compared to other platforms, and their support team are always really helpful and very often solve any issues within a day or two. Our account manager is always really happy to help and we have a very established pertnership that works really well.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
There isn't much I dislike about Dotdigital - but perhaps one thing I think is that maybe some of the native analytic in the pages and forms section could be enhanced?

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dotdigital really helps us segment our client audiences by giving them the right content, at the right time. This is invaluable in targeting content globally as we have a large client base with a huge variety in business and regional needs.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent email marketing tool with professional team support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
The platform itself is very intuitive to use.
As a manager, I don't use Dotdigital every single day but when I do, I find it easy to navigate and if I'm ever not sure the tech support and our account managers (Ash and now Tom)  are always on hand to help.
There's a handy darg a drop element to lots of the builds
The analytics are very eay to access and understand.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
There is so much cutsomisation when building emails that sometimes it's a bit overhwelming to begind with.
I also think that copying and pasting text into an email template with a set stle should automatically change your pasted text into that stylerather than having to right clikc and select paste as plain text.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dotdigital enables us to send on-brand emails to mass audiecnes and track their efectiveness.
Our data needs are quite complex and Dotdigital offers segmentation as well as other services like forms and landing pages which are also very useful for lead generation and compelting the email marketing cycle.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to use API for maximum benefit
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
Easy to use API doc library allows non-technical marketers to brief in new features easily to website dev teams. Once implemented, the constantly updating product blocks, with e-commerce reporting, provide an added dimension to email reporting that supplements the classic opens/clicks/ROI of a one-off campaign nicely.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
The initial on-boarding process was painful with a lack of technical support, but that has been ironed out now. You should review how Fresh Relevance do things to understand how amazing technical support is given to customers...

Consent records not over-writing on the person record is a real drawback, I don't see any reason to have multiple consent records - if I upload the same contact I would like it to over-write the consent record rather than ending up with 5 or 6 of the same one.

Having suppressions AND unsubscribes is also unnecessary, confusing & should be much easier to manage & explain. Will be interesting to see how Fresh Relevance is utilised in the future with regards to person record merging...

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having a single source of truth for our consent, and providing timely marketing comms to different industry types

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to use for the whole organisation
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
Very easy to use and then to train the 30+ users we have across the organisation. Being able to send for approval means that we're able to ensure the quality with so many users. By having multiple accounts, we can give peoples access to the feature that they need rather than risk any errors. The implementation process was very simple and quick, and the level of ongoing support is great, our account manager, Tom, is always very quick to respond and offer advice, guidance and best practice.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
With how our organisation is set up we have multiple child accounts so to add certain features we have to do multiple times, but DotDigital are more than happy to support us with this.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Ensuring that all of our emails are branded, keeping us GDPR compliant in terms of unsubscribes and making sure that everyone who receives an email wants to receive it.

all_reviews.review_title: Very easy to use platform with comprehensive marketing solutions.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
A very straightforward platform that is easy to use and navigate. Continual upgrades and improvements are made to the platform and the team are very supportive in helping you implement any updates. Our account manager always shows a genuine interest in our success and is supportive of our brand goals, offering a great level of feedback as a platform expert.

I use DotDigital every day across multiple user accounts to send everything from triggered emails and programs, to service communications, and marketing campaigns. We've also made use of the pages and form features which offer a great level of data in an easy-to-digest format for surveys.

We are able to access a great level of analysis for each email which helps us grow and develop our email marketing strategy. Dotdigital integrates well with our website and other platforms such as Fresh Relevance to give a really holistic approach to our marketing.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
Sometimes I find that the support/help sections don't give me the exact information I need or enough explanation on how something works. I often have to contact our account manager via email for further help or guidance which can interrupt workflow.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dotdigital helps make our email marketing responsive, impactful and allows us to continually review and improve our marketing strategy.

all_reviews.review_title: Dotdigital Review - December 2023
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
We use Dotdigital for a variety of comms, such as: Partner mailers, launch & discon mailers. internal comms. etc.

It handles these tasks with ease and it's good to see the reporting at the end of each campaign. However, it would be great to be able to export segment analysis, at the moment this can only be reviewed on screen which is a little limiting when trying to report back to senior management.

I find the tool easy to use and when training new starters, they generally pick up the tools processes within a few sends.

The support and account management we receive is great and I really like the live chat feature to quickly address any potential tech issues.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
We created new templates recently and this was a challenge to get right due to the drag and drop system deployed on Dotdigital. When asking the Support Team for help we were told they could not help as the templates were not built directly in Dotdigital.

Using the recommended support articles was okay, however I feel some of the issues we encountered could have been resolved much easier and quicker with a product expert.

It would be better if additional charges could be removed mid-contract, e.g. in some cases you may identify you no longer need a Pages and Form package, but you have to wait until the end of your contract to remove. To add to this point, there is no verification process to block child accounts from purchasing extensions as they please - I feel an approval system must be put in place to protect the main account holder from incurring charges which have not been check or verified first.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dotdigital allows the wider Marketing Team to get involved and build communications, due to its easy drag and drop system. For me personally this saves time on my workload.

all_reviews.review_title: Supportive all the way
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
As an Email Marketing Officer at a charity, Dotdigital has been an invauable asset to our organiation's outreach effortd. One of the best aspects is the exceptional spport from their account manaers and the support team who are always available on live chat to help. Their guidance has been instrumental in tailoring solutions that align with our charitable goas, ensuring our campaigns effectively enagage our supporters.

The company's commitment to innovation is particularly noteworthy. They consistenctly intoduce new features and functionalities that enable their customers to adapt to an every changing and developing digital environment.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
I think the only downsides is a lot of the development work that gets done can be focused at ecommerce and so forgets about other sectors like NGO's a little. But this seems to be changing and the focused shifting to include a wider audience which may be because of the roadmap they ask us to contribute to which I find really motivating.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dotdigi's automation tools and segmentation options have been invalable in personalising our messages and nurturing relationships with our supporters, ultimately driving increased engagement and support for our charity. As such a large national charity with so many different stakeholders the product enbles us to meet everyones needs and communicate effectively which we couldn't do otherwise as effectively. It has also meant we can move away fro doing as many paper mailings which is better for the environment.

Ease of integration with Shopify makes it easy for our team as well to manage things on our own.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
It is daunting for any one without the technical/agency background to start working it, so it will take time to learn how to work the platform.

Duplication is not available for all functions across parent and child accounts so if other then templates, everything else you want to replicate in another account needs to be built from scratch.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to build basic welcome programs, abandon cart programs etc to set the foundations right.

all_reviews.review_title: DotDigital makes our email programme more efficient
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
We really like the program builder. It's enabled us to activate various customer journeys and simplify some daily tasks. The platform is really easy to use so multiple people across the organisation are able to build their own emails with support from the CRM team.

The support is great, we're able to easily log a problem, either with Tom or the support team. The training is also great.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
We find reporting on programs a little frustrating as we aren't able to easily see how programs are performing overall.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're able to test a lot more than we could with our previous platform which is great for learning how effective our campaigns are. The program builder allows us to complete day to day tasks which used to be really manual for us and take up a lot of time. We have a vast number of different audiences and the dynamic content feature allows us to build one email to various audiences, again saving time.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I love the ease of using the platform and also the great support we receive as a user. There are lots of helpful guides and when you get really stuck you get access to a product specialist very quickly. Our account manager has been great and very helpful in solving what we found as complex issues.

The functionality within dotdigital means we are able to provide high quality support to our clients and so deliver professional emails.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
The new layout meant I had to spend a bit of time to find everything. Once I found everything it's relatively easy. What I would like as a functionality is the ability to pause, and print the page where we confirm everything priort to mail as check point for our clients. Often we ask them to join a virtual call and look through everything with us. However if we're able to add all the functionality and capture the page before pressing the ok this would be provide an added measure of reassurance and protection for us.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
To be able to issue emails on our client's behalf and especially for those who do not have that functionality available within their organisation.

Dotdigital has been easy for me to understand and use and has been a useful way for me to reach out to potential clients.
The Templates are an excellent starting point and are easy to adapt to fit my marketing objective.
I had a prompt and friendly response to any queries that occured and the problem was always resolved.
I mainly used Dotdigital once a Quarter, but occasionally had a one-off promotion and was able to target interested parties smoothly.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
review_question_answers.answer: I occasionally had difficulty with the Address books, but that was mainly because I'm not very tech confident.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Dotdigital is a fast way to communicate and enabled me to reach multiple customers in a stylish way and comprehensive way.

all_reviews.review_title: Sophisticated and convenient
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
The most helpful feature of Dotdigital is that it synchs with our CRM database, StratusLive. This creates significant segmentation efficiences as well as recording touchpoints.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
Dotdigital challenges our organization to think about email marketing in a more sophisticated way than we are currently accustomed to.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dotdigital helps ensure we have a solid email send score so our communications are delivered to inboxes, not junk folders. Its analytics help us reduce unsubscribes and improve KPIs.

all_reviews.review_title: Professional, targeted & trustworthy
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
- The unboarding process and set up was smooth and the team were very friendly and helpful
- The support and training we receive for campaigns and setting up programs has been thorough and highly useful
- It is a quick and easy platform to use and create campaigns, as well as reporting
- We are using the platform more to understand our data and audiences
- The features we can use for targeting are really exciting and interesting to test out as we get to use the platform more

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
Unfortunately, we cannot fully integrate with Donorflex, however, we have an easy solution with regular uploads of our data from our technical team members.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
DotDigital are solving onboarding for new subscribers with automated programmes. Our data is more up to date and easier to analyse.

all_reviews.review_title: Makes Email Campaigns a Breeze
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
User-friendly platform that is easy to learn and to navigate around. Building email campagns is easy. Customer service has always been very helpful and friendly when needed. Some fun features in regards to data such as the heat-map to show popular click-throughs.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
When duplicating an email you can only do this one at a time. Similarily when deleting/moving contacts you can only select maximum 50 at a time. So sometimes this can be quite slow and repetitive when for example wanting to duplicate 5 emails that are part of long-term monthly campaign.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Dotdigital for all our email campaigns (e.g monthly newsletters) and formal mass communications with our business supporters. It allows us to monitor who is opening our emails and what actions they are taking from this which is really important information for us to gather when assessing how involved a business is with our charity. It's also allowed us to build our database in the last few years and monitor this

all_reviews.review_title: A good email marketing provider with helpful customer support, and useful automation
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
Defining audiences and creating attractive emails is very easy. It's easy to send emails and to report on the activities we undertake.
The automation features are very helpful, and have allowed us to create journeys relevant to our customers.
The customer support desk is always on hand when we need to ask questions and are very helpful.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
Some areas of administration aren't the best - for example the forms don't always work for our users, and we have limited knowledge as to why.
Segmenting can only go so far, and is a bit limited in terms of how far you can drill down into a customer's behaviour or data.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's allowing us to automate some of our transactions.

all_reviews.review_title: Great email platform, powerful email builder, frustrating customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
Brilliant drag-and-drop email builder with little to no HTML knowledge required. Able to make good-looking and functional emails very easily, or drop in pre-built HTML emails with simple HTML editing that works. Segments were easy to build, good journey tools, easy to use personalisation options and good insights shared with their customers. We used it for every email sent to customers. It was implemented in 2009 - we had a long contract.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
We wanted to expand our contract with Dotdigital by linking our CMS with the platform, making personalisation and segmentation more powerful. I contacted customer support in August 2021 about the plug-in solution. After a delay in which I had to follow up several times, I got through to a Customer Success manager in September. Unfortunately, after my initial email. They stopped being able to see my follow-up emails - we never found out why. After never getting through to anyone on the phone, I asked the main support team to help; they forwarded my emails to the Customer Success team and confirmed someone would be in touch. After some time with no response from anyone, I asked for a follow-up to support and heard nothing.

We were very invested in pursuing the Dotdigital plug-in route and were actively open to growing our account; however, after repeated dead ends, we couldn't justify considering it moving forward and decided to go with a different provider. Once we notified them we would need information about closing our account, they responded rapidly and asked why. It was passed on, and we moved on.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
When we were using it, Dotdigital acted as our all-in-one ESP and journey builder with a sign-up plug-in on our website. It allowed us to save money (important for a non-profit) on designing and building emails by doing it in-house. We loved only being charged for the emails we sent. The journey automations allowed us to grow prospects from contacts to supporters. In a previous role, the SMS tool was helpful in sharing quick and timely information with event participants.

all_reviews.review_title: Low cost product in comparison to other platforms on the market, but you get what you pay for
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
The platform is pretty cheap compared to others in the market, and there was some flexibility around the contract they offered, especially useful for startups unable to commit to long-term contracts. The team were friendly & chatty, making onboarding conversations and initial research quick & not too complicated.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
The platform itself is limited in its functionality compared to others in the market - showing that you get what you pay for regarding the monthly cost being less than other available platforms. Despite clearly outlining some questions/concerns/issues with our client support rep & the onboarding rep, I didn't receive any response or solutions without chasing (or at all), so the customer support post-onboarding is lacking.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending customer emails (primarily Marketing rather than transactional for us) & saving templates to use for future email creation, which saves time. I also used the workflow set up functionality for clear customer comms processes.

all_reviews.review_title: A very powerful tool in the right hands
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
The platform's standout feature is its ability to unify and enrich data from across the marketing stack, creating a single, trusted source for your digital marketing strategy. The platform excels at campaign creation. It allows you to build complex customer journeys easily with the flow builder and drag and drop elments in the campaing builder,  it makes segmenting easy and provides excelent deliverablity all while de-skilling the process so no coding is necessary.

The platform organises and visualises data well, providing easily digestable insights and opportunities to build high-converting campaigns that drive revenue. Whilst I export data and create my own reports due the complexity of running seven magento stores, the dashboards can help you focus on quick wins and the big picture simultaneously. Its an invaluable tool for marketers in my oppinion.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
There are a few samll issues with sorting an filiering in tables that would like to see haveing more database type features avaible. I would also like to see the create and template sections of the campaing builder murged so that both subject and creatve could be configured at the same time.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
As I operate on my own in the roll of eCommerc and Markeing manager it allows me to delver and manage massivily more campaings that would otherwise be possible, as takes the majority of the hard work out of the process. We have used the platform since 2015 and I could not operate as successfully without it.

all_reviews.review_title: Marketing Emails Trigged by Salesforce out of Dotdigital
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
The programs (both joiners and standard) are great as they add automation to email campaigns and address books.  The fact that the address books are automatically populated from Salesforce using the Integrator is brilliant.  Also, it is excellent that the Integrator syncs the end-user email interactions back into Salesforce, meaning all the information is readily available.  Lastly, Dotdigital's customer support has been outstanding when we have had questions or issues.  Great product supported by dedicated people.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
Some of the support documentation is a  little short on detail, but in general, it is good.  Data fields have non user friendly labels which can be an issue when exposing them to end users.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Dotdigital to send our marketing emails.  We have been using the product for a few years, but now we have added the Salesforce Integration.  This removed lots of manual exports and imports, and more importantly emails are sent automatically based on triggers in our Salesforce org.

review_question_answers.answer: The programs (both joiners and standard) are great as they add automation to email campaigns and address books.  The fact that the address books are automatically populated from Salesforce using the Integrator is brilliant.  Also, it is excellent that the Integrator syncs the end-user email interactions back into Salesforce, meaning all the information is readily available.  Lastly, Dotdigital's customer support has been outstanding when we have had questions or issues.  Great product supported by dedicated people.

all_reviews.review_title: Inconvenience and not user friendly
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
The customer service are prompt in their reply but useful or not, it depends.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
A simple "Cart Abandonment" email requires many "Dotdigital Experts" to look at it and edit it but it still fails after serval attempts. (FYI, we took almost 4 months back and forth to on it)

A simple "Back in stock" email will send "re-confirm email to customer" to re-confirm whether they want to subscribe again and if customer do not respond to the email, the "Back in stock" will not be captured and customer will not be notified.

Furthermore, the re-confirm email are not able to edit anything, the branding and the tone of the email are fixed. How flexible and hasslefree is this for our customers and who in the world will expect to still receive a re-confirmation email when they subscribe to the "back in stock" in any online store?

If there is something that Dotdigital cannot fix, they will still ask you to go to fill up their "Dotdigital Roadmap" to help them plan and review all the things that they are not able to fix.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
There is many "Dotdigital Experts" that will look at your problem and propose a solution. But whether it really works ultimately?

all_reviews.review_title: Dotdigital makes it easy to create and send out emails, along with being able to track them.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
Dotdigital makes it easy to create custom-made email templates that can be sent out to customisable contact lists. Along with this, being able to track campaigns allows us to tell our customers how well their email campaign has been received. We have API's working alongside Dotdigital to enable us to send out e-vouchers from our supplier directly to our customers instantly.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
We are having issues with emails being sent to Gmail and Hotmail email addresses, resulting in any emails we send out ending up in customers' junk folders. This is, however, being reviewed, and we are getting help from Dotdigital to try and help rectify this.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
Being able to create separate contact lists for sending out custom-made email templates in a campaign that can be tracked. As well as, being able to send out our evouchers automatically to customers so that they don't have to wait for someone to send them out manually has been a massive benefit.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dotdigital?
I like how easy Dotdigital has made it for me to streamline my marketing efforts. I'm able to reach my audience in a more targeted and effective manner because to tools like email automation, SMS marketing, and social media management.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
While I enjoy the variety of options provided by Dotdigital, I find the interface to be a little daunting at first. It took some time for me to become used to navigating the many options and figuring out how they all fit together.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
I was having difficulty keeping track of all of the many channels I needed to maintain in order to properly market my items. Dotdigital has been a game changer for me, allowing me to pool my resources and accomplish more in less time. I'm able to focus on other aspects of my business while keeping a strong online presence by automating my email campaigns and social media posts.

What do you dislike about Dotdigital?
I'm really struggling to find something, but the recent move of stats to analytics on the left hand menu. I can no longer filter on email folders the way I used to (or certainly can't find it), which makes reporting a bit harder.

What problems is Dotdigital solving and how is that benefiting you?
The user-friendli-ness means we can easily change emails and keep our engagement rates ever-increasing with fresh content.

Having a no-hassle supplier is worth so much. We work with other 3rd parties and it can be painful. Very grateful I don't have any issues with DD!

The technical support we receive is fantastic - especially when it comes to integration with our CRM. Our CRM supplier can be difficult to work with - but I know DD will be all over it!
